adrFormatAddress: 3976 10th Ave, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text: Definitely do not recommend using Zipcar! Not worth the stress. The cars are filthy, the service unreliable, and customer service is dishonest and careless. Especially do not recommend if you have somewhere to be at a certain time- the car will likely be late or never even show up. There are better options out there, stay clear of Zipcar.

text.text: Definitely do not recommend using Zipcar! Not worth the stress. The cars are filthy, the service unreliable, and customer service is dishonest and careless. Especially do not recommend if you have somewhere to be at a certain time- the car will likely be late or never even show up. There are better options out there, stay clear of Zipcar.

originalText.text: The ZipCar franchise in northern Manhattan continues to provide less than stellar service.  It would appear that whatever enterprise has been hired by Avis to service these cars for this area is incompetent and uncaring.  The last car I rented had an emergency tire on the right front wheel. I was planning a highway trip so no go.  The car before that was filthy inside and out, reeked of cigarettes and marijuana and had grease pencil notations on the rear and left quarter panel windows.  I'm no saying don't rent. I AM saying check the car carefully before you drive off.  Call and complain if you are not satisfied.

originalText.text: I've been using Zipcar for about a good ten years now very reliable I love the ability to be able to run vehicles for a few hours even a week if needed gas is included and you could find many vehicle throughout the area

originalText.text: Zip car is a great way to get around NYC without the worry of parking afterwards. But they have been slacking lately ,I have been in dirty cars ,or cars with wrong fuel cards things like that should be addressed again and Zip Car would be great again.

originalText.text: Easy way to rent a vehicle on the spot when you need it and all vehicles are brand new.
